text: 5.22: Je 1.19 naŋga, 1 Jo 3.15Hara yi narɨŋ nɨmavin, kru mumɨŋga nɨŋusi vaha mana nɨŋura naŋga kuyu mɨŋgurɨmandɨ hama, ŋgatɨŋgɨrutɨŋgɨru hamandu tamɨŋgañɨ taŋguramɨrɨmandɨ. Ara kru mumɨŋga nɨŋusi vaha mana nɨŋuraŋ mɨkatihɨrɨmandɨ hama, kru Juda hatindu kuyu mɨŋasɨrɨvandu haŋɨnɨŋɨndu tamɨŋgañɨ taŋguramɨrɨmandɨ. Sɨwɨmaña ndaya kru mumɨŋga yahata kru mumɨŋgarɨm na kwɨnɨkwɨnɨ mɨŋga vɨrɨmandɨ hama ahutuvarandi helɨyɨ urɨmandɨ.
